course.subject: IEDA
course.name: Engineering Statistics and Data Analytics
course.description: The course introduces advanced concepts and mathematical principles in statistical  inference (e.g., estimation theory, hypothesis testing, and regression models) and machine learning (e.g. classification and tree-based models, support vector machines, model selection, and unsupervised learning). This course assumes the knowledge of multivariable calculus and probability.

reviews.author: Summer123
reviews.title: content and grade are good
reviews.comment_content: content is rich,full of statistic knowledge, maybe  it is more difficult for the student who is the first time to reach these statistic content.
reviews.comment_teaching: The teaching method is quite satisfactory. because of the rich content, he had to focus on the slides of the course, but it is very well-organized.
reviews.comment_grading: I have to say the grade is good ! Homework grade is almost 100/100! and abpout the exam, TA and Teacher will try to give you more points if you write the right process but comput wrong.
reviews.comment_workload: every week has a homework, if you want to do it perfectly. it needs time! mabe a little heavy for me.
